Pre-specify plotting function arguments

Source: R/compile_problem.R
compile_figure.Rd

Pre-specify plotting function arguments

Usage

compile_figure(func, vars)

Arguments

func

function Plotting function with single argument taking a list of plotting variables.

vars

listish List or environment containing variables to make available for string interpolation. Defaults to parent.frame().

Value

A function with no arguments that uses the original function on the variables in vars.

Examples

vars <- list(x = 1:5, y = 5:1)
func <- function(args) plot(args$x, args$y, pch=19)
func_noargs <- compile_figure(func, vars)
func_noargs()
